immediate_actions: Clean with saline or pet shampoo diluted
Monitor for licking - E-collar if needed

seek_medical_attention.timeframe: If large area, very dirty, or not healing in 5-7 days

full_protocol_text: Dog scrape/road rash: Clean with diluted pet shampoo or saline. Pet-safe antiseptic spray. E-collar if licking. Keep dry. See vet if large, very dirty, or signs of infection.
